pageContext.description:
The painting shows the Margrave Georg Friedrich as an almost frontal, half-length figure against a dark curtain (later addition). He is clad in armour and looks out confidently at the viewer. 
[cda 2020]
pageContext.dimensions:
Dimensions of support: 97 x 74 cm
[SPSG 2004, 131]
[Lost Art database: http://www.lostart.de/DE/Verlust/54652; accessed 21.05.2020]
pageContext.markings:
Inscription at the top:
'V:G:G: Georg Fridrich Marggraf zu Brandenburgk in Preussen. //
Auch in Schlesien und Jegerndorf und etc. Hertzog etc.'

Probably added in the 17th century together with the dark curtain
[SPSG 2004, 131]
pageContext.medium:
Painting on wood
[Stiftung Preußische Schlösser und Gärten 2004, 131]
[Lost Art database: http://www.lostart.de/DE/Verlust/54652; accessed 21.05.2020]
